nodes.text: Finn Tegotash was a member of Hondo Ohnaka's pirate gang during the Clone Wars. In 22 BBY, he was present during the time that the gang held Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, and Count Dooku prisoner. Two years later, Finn fought in a skirmish after many of Hondo's pirates joined Darth Maul and Savage Opress in their conquest for power. Finn attempted to defend Ohnaka's outpost, but was shot to death by one of Maul's defected pirates.
Finn preferred to wield two small knives in combat rather than a blaster, the standard weapon of the Ohnaka Gang.[source?]
He wore very simple clothing, consisting of a drab beige top and plain blue pants; as well as standard boots.
